pages.text: 54|28|Va ʙa onon e'lom kun, ki oʙi [coh] ʙajni eson [va on modasutur] sahmijaʙandi sudaast va har ki dar navʙati xud ʙojad hozir savad»
54|29|Vale onon hamdastasonro nido dodand; u niz dast ʙa kor sud va [suturro] ʙa qatl rasond
54|30|Pas, [ʙingared] ki azoʙu husdorhoi Man ci guna ʙud
54|31|Mo ʙar onon ʙongi margʙore firistodem; pas, [hamagi] hamcun gijohi xuskida [ʙozmonda az oƣilho] xurdu rez sudand
54|32|Ba rosti, ki Qur'onro ʙaroi pand giriftan oson soxtem; ojo pandpazire hast
54|33|Qavmi Lut [niz] husdordihandagonro duruƣgu pindostand
54|34|[Mo niz] Tufoni regʙore ʙar sarason firistodem [ki hamagiro halok kard]; magar xonavodai Lut, ki sahargohon nacotason dodem
54|35|[In nacot] Ne'mate az coniʙi Mo ʙud; va ʙa har ki siposguzori kunad, in guna podos medihem
54|36|Lut ononro az kajfari [saxti] Mo ʙim dod; vale onon dar ʙaroʙari husdorho ʙa mucodala [va sitez] ʙarxostand
54|37|Onon az Lut xostand, ki mehmononasro [ʙaroi komcui] dar ixtijorason ʙigzorad; pas, Mo niz casmonasonro kur kardem [va guftem]: «Ta'mi azoʙu [naticai] husdorhojamro ʙicased»
54|38|Va suʙhgohon azoʙe pojdor ononro faro girift
54|39|[Va guftem] «Ta'mi azoʙu [naticai] husdorhojamro ʙicased»
54|40|Ba rosti, ki Qur'onro ʙaroi pand giriftan oson soxtem; ojo pandpazire hast
54|41|Husdordihandagon ʙa suroƣi fir'avnijon [niz] raftand
54|42|[Vale] Onon tamomii ojoti Moro duruƣ sumurdand; mo niz cunon [ki soistai Parvardigori] sikastnopaziru muqtadir [ast] azoʙason kardem
54|43|[Ej ahli Makka] Ojo kofironi sumo az onon ʙehtarand jo ʙaroi sumo amonnomae dar kitoʙhoi [osmonii pesin navistasuda] ast
54|44|Jo megujand: «Mo camoate muttahidu intiqomcu hastem»
54|45|Ba zudi [dar cangi Badr] cam'ason sikast mexurand va firori xohand sud
54|46|Va'dagohason qijomat ast, ki [nisʙat ʙa majdoni Badr ruzgore ʙisjor] saxttaru talxtar ast
54|47|Gunahgoron dar gumrohi va azoʙand
54|48|Ruze, ki ʙo cehrahojason dar otas kasida mesavand [va ʙa onon megujand] «Otasi duzaxro ʙicased»
54|49|Be tardid, Mo har cizero ʙa andoza ofaridaem
